de.fhg.fit.biomos.sensorplatform.deprecated

Interface Hciconfig

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HciconfigImpl

    public interface Hciconfig
    Control class for hciconfig command line tool from Bluez. This one is NOT interactive. Because of strange bugs on the Raspberry Pi 3, the sensorplatform must restart the local Bluetoth controller once. Otherwise pairing is not working properly.
    Author:
    Daniel Pyka

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void down()
      Shut down the Bluetooth controller.
      String getLocalBDaddress()
      Read the local Bluetooth controller address.
      void up()
      Start the Bluetooth controller.
